property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TransformPreference (a Application).

property.name: dimensionsIncludeStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: If true, includes the stroke weight when displaying object dimensions. If false, measures objects from the path or frame.

property.name: transformationsAreTotals
property.shortdesc: If true, transformation values are relative to the parent object. If false, the transformation values are absolute values.

property.name: showContentOffset
property.shortdesc: If true, measures the x and y values of the object relative to the containing frame. If false, measures the x and y values relative to the rulers.

property.name: whenScaling
property.shortdesc: The method used to scale a page item.

property.name: adjustStrokeWeightWhenScaling
property.shortdesc: If true, strokes are scaled when objects are scaled.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TransformPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
